title: Enhancing Language Education Design Competencies Through Automation Instructional Design Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can complete a language education design framework using an automated instructional design tool.
Learners can analyze and address knowledge gaps that emerge during the tool-based design process.
Learners can submit a practical language instructional design plan through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
